title: Introducing: Teen Brains
body:
_Lethargic pop at its best._

_ Annabel_, the debut outing from Norwich’s **Teen** **Brains** is 3 minutes of delightfully surfy pop. The infectious vocal lines are harmonised to blissful effect, cast over a weary lo-fi backing which will be stuck in your head for days.

Stream _Annabel_ below via **[Gold](http://www.goldflakepaint.co.uk/introducing-teen-brains/)****[Flake](http://www.goldflakepaint.co.uk/introducing-teen-brains/)****[Paint](http://www.goldflakepaint.co.uk/introducing-teen-brains/)**[ ](http://www.goldflakepaint.co.uk/introducing-teen-brains/)

The infectious vocal lines are harmonised to blissful effect, cast over a weary lo-fi backing which will be stuck in your head for days. Stream Annabel below via GoldFlakePaint
